input.sentences: a graduation party was thrown in the park .
a lot of food was there for everyone .
the family is so proud of their graduate .
then after the party everyone played volleyball .
output.sentences: The party was thrown in the park down the street.
There was a lot of food.
We had Rice Krispie Treats for dessert.
This is a picture of the graduate and the proud family.
The party also had a great game of volleyball.
